Text.Page:
The Atel Akaad are backing Killian's play, though who knows why.

These are some of Atel Akaad's best Lokians and they control the path to the temple.

Cut the Lokian bloodshapers and bloodspillers down and link up with Degare near the Barbican. He's got more orders for you.

See these signets? They're argon in origin. Few realize the link between Atel Akaad and the argons.

If Killian's working with them, we would all do well to be afraid.

Fine work with the Lokians, by the way, but we're not done yet.
Did you kill the Lokians yet? We can't let the Atel Akaad dictate the pace of this battle!
